item.dc:creator: admin

Icon WordPress Block allows you to build user-friendly and simplified interfaces with a set of fully customizable icons.

item.title: Image Box WordPress Block
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Image Box WordPress Block empowers you to have more flexibility in image customization and build image-centered services pages. You can apply animation effects, change sizing, spacing, captions and more.

item.title: Social Links WordPress Block
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Social Links WordPress Block makes it easy to add social icons in style with your theme and customize their alignment for different devices.

Icons outlined, with background, default

item.title: Banner WordPress Block
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Banner WordPress Block allows you to build awesome promo banners, portfolio pages or put hot offers in the spotlight. The block comes with customizable sizing, alignments, colors, animation effects and more tools to help you get creative.

How User Experience Helps

item.title: Image Slider WordPress Block
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Image Slider WordPress Block offers a simple slider block for WordPress with the ability to modify navigation styles, the size of slides and animation effects.

Single slide

Multiple slides, controls inside

Multiple slides, custom height & slideshow

Slides with custom links

item.title: Button Group WordPress Block
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Button Group WordPress Block adds a call-to-action marketing button in style and harmony with your theme. You'll be able to update the width, alignment, and direction for the whole set of buttons.

item.title: Image Stack Gallery WordPress Block
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Image Stack Gallery WordPress Block is a unique and simple block that allows you to build impressive image galleries by using seven gallery layout styles.

Default style

Selected style - "Zeta"

item.title: Instagram WordPress Block
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Instagram WordPress Block provides an easy connection bridge between your Instagram account and WordPress allowing you to embed a stylish live-feed Instagram gallery.

Nine items & three columns, small spacing between items

Five items & five columns, no spacing between items

item.title: Advanced Spacer WordPress Block
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Advanced Spacer WordPress Block will help you create better design consistency by applying spacing of the needed size between blocks. Feel free to set those custom spaces selectively for mobile, tablet or desktop devices.

item.title: Video Popup WordPress Block
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Video Popup WordPress Block allows you to upload and display Youtube, Vimeo or self-hosted videos in awesome popups. Feel free to tailor the play video button, add video covers, and modify colors/sizes of the Gutenberg plugin container.

item.title: Section WordPress Block
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Section WordPress Block for Gutenberg Library is a multi-block container with deeply customizable layout and style settings (animation, background, typography and more). This is one of the ultimate addons for Gutenberg that can help you organize content in multiple creative ways.

Background image, gradient background overlay

item.title: Google Maps WordPress Block
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Google Maps WordPress Block is one of those Google Map addons that can be implemented without extra dependencies, allowing you to add multiple custom location markers and add maps in different styles.

item.title: Advanced Heading WordPress Block
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Advanced Heading WordPress Block makes it easy to bring a truly custom typography to your WordPress theme. It gives access to Google fonts, styling, sizing, font weight, one-click text case conversion, letter spacing, colors and more tools to make your headings stand out.

choose a font style
you can choose any font-weight
You Can Choose any Google Font
Any style and color of this font

item.title: Accordion WordPress Block
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Accordion WordPress Block brings accordion tabs you can use to build FAQ sections and categorize information with Gutenberg blocks. The headings and icons are customizable.

item.title: Recent Posts WordPress Block
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Recent Posts WordPress Block is super handy for adding automatically sourced posts from your blog on any other page. Along with the variety of layouts, it ships with a ton of functionalities you wonâ€™t find in other Gutenberg plugins.

Grid layout, three columns, H3 heading, post meta hidden

List layout, H2 heading

item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Countdown WordPress Block
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Countdown WordPress Block adds a live countdown timer with numeric values and time labels, wherein you can change a default font family, style, sizes, spaces and the color scheme.

Custom background and text colors.

Custom font-family, font size, text color.

item.title: Contact Form WordPress Block
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Contact Form WordPress Block allows you to embed a fully-functional, no-frills contact form in Gutenberg with customizable fields, labels and support for reCAPTCHA.

item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Counter WordPress Block is a perfect Gutenberg block for adding animated number counters.

item.title: Posts Grid/List WordPress Block
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Custom Post Type WordPress Block is a one-of-a-kind Gutenberg block for automatically sourced WordPress posts, pages and custom post types that can be showcased in a grid, list or custom view. There is a ton of layout and styles settings to build a custom look.

List layout, with pagination

Grid layout, two columns, without pagination

item.title: Posts Carousel WordPress Block
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Post Carousel WordPress Block allows you to list or grid posts that are automatically sourced from your site.

Controls outside, three columns, small spacing

Arrows inside, dots hidden, two columns, large spacing, slideshow enabled

item.title: Posts Slider WordPress Block
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Post Slider WordPress Block gives you a tool to display website posts in a slider with the ability to completely customize a slide layout.

Controls inside, slide animation effect, slideshow enabled

Controls outside, fade animation effect

item.title: Progress Bar WordPress Blocks
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Linear Progress Bar

Linear Progress Bar WordPress Block adds an animated horizontal progress bar, wherein you can change colors and values.

HTML

95%

CSS

93%

JS

85%

Design

75%

Circular Progress Bar

Circular Progress Bar WordPress Block adds animated circular progress bars, wherein you can adjust a bar sickness, size and colors.

item.title: Image Hotspot WordPress Block
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Image Hotspot WordPress Block is a one-of-a-kind block for the Gutenberg library that allows for placing any number of animated markers/tooltips over images to make them more instructive.

Site Header
Menu
Site Content

Custom tooltip point icon and background color, active tooltip by default, tooltip positioning.

Site Header
Menu

item.title: Content Timeline WordPress Block
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Content Timeline WordPress Block allows you to build a stunning animated timeline graph that features a chronological order of events. You can go deeply into customization by altering headings, subheadings, images and more.

Display your Youtube, Vimeo or self-hosted videos in popups; the play video button, custom video covers, colors and sizes of the block containers are fully adjustable.

item.title: MailChimp WordPress Block
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Mailchimp WordPress Block is a Gutenberg blocks connection tool that allows you to add a Mailchimp newsletter subscription box to WordPress.
